name: congressman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man who belongs to a congress, especially a member of the US House of Representatives Compare
congresswoman
Examples
He was accused of perjury by a Republican congressman.She invited the wife of an Illinois congressman to tea.He is just an obscure congressman, not the president.
